Banner_help_content: You can help keep BRMW alive.
Hero_tagline: Create conceptual or logical database models and export SQL code right from your browser
Features_easy_to_use_content: The friendly and intuitive interface allows you to use the tool without complications
Features_access_from_anywhere_content: Your projects stored in the cloud and available from any device, anywhere
Features_convert_in_seconds_content: Build and convert between conceptual, logical and physical (SQL) levels
Features_visualize_relationships_content: Use the relationship entity diagram to represent connections and entities
